itunes:title: BONUS // all things nursing & CRNA school with nurse darian
title: BONUS // all things nursing & CRNA school with nurse darian
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
itunes:summary:
'Tis the season for a BONUS episodes! Darian is back behind the mic to deck the halls with all things nursing & CRNA school. Britt's brining all of your burning questions to the table; shadowing, applications, advice, balancing family & studying, certifications, departments, interviews & more!

Timestamps:
 
1:30 applying to nursing & CRNA school
3:30 tips on shadowing
3:40 knowing people
4:00 how many times darian applied
4:36 balancing time with britt
5:25 how CRNA school is different from nursing school
6:20 getting an associates in nursing before getting bsn
7:10 darian's advice for nursing students
8:40 being at Michigan State
9:15 balancing family & school time
10:00 HURST review & practice questions
11:30 priorities; sleep, school, social
12:30 making time to hang out
13:00 grind mode
13:40 path from BSN to CRNA school
15:50 extra certifications
16:40 rejections
18:00 departments; trauma ICU, nero, brain & spine
19:35 Zoom interview
20:50 practice/mock interviews
21:45 why CRNA & being a floor nurse
24:00 why a nurse & not a doctor
25:40 respiratory therapists (RT's)
26:50 balancing family
28:00 hours spent studying
29:00 GPA advice
30:55 OR nurses
31:10 fav snacks
32:00 best way to support a partner going through school
35:40 travel nursing
37:00 comparison
41:30 darian's recap/sparknotes
